problems.title: Second Largest Distinct Element
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of N integers (possibly with duplicates), find the second largest distinct element. If less than 2 distinct elements exist, return -1.

Input Format
First line: N
Second line: N integers

Output Format
Single integer: second largest distinct value or -1

Example 1
Input:
8
12 35 1 10 34 1 35 35

Output:
34
hintsList: Use a Set to remove duplicates first, then find second max
Or do it in O(n) with two variables carefully handling duplicates

problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum (Kadane’s Algorithm basic)
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Find the contiguous subarray with the largest sum and return that sum.

Input Format
First line: N
Second line: N integers

Output Format
Single integer: maximum subarray sum

Example
Input:
9
-2 1 -3 4 -1 2 1 -5 4

Output:
6

Explanation: [4, -1, 2, 1] has sum = 6
hintsList: Use two variables: current_max and global_max
If current_max becomes negative → reset to current element
